items.title: Online Customer Support
items.description: Our online portal allows you 24/7 access to manage all of your test equipment assets, calibration reports, and documentation in one place.

items.title: Online Calibration Form
items.description: Simple, quick, and effective. Our online RMA form will ensure that you are able to track the movement of your instruments as they leave your site and are returned.

items.title: QR Coding
items.description: No more lost calibration certificates. Each instrument that is calibrated has a QR code attached which contains the corresponding calibration certificate.

items.title: Low Measurement Uncertainty
items.description: Withing the scope of the calibration the best possible instruments class is identified in each case, We can determine low measurement uncertainties as a function of defined criteria such as display deviation or repeat accuracy.

items.title: Turn Around Time
items.description: We understand that time is money. Our standard turnaround is 3-5 days, with expedited service options for when you’re really in a rush.

items.title: Automated Calibration Software
items.description: Our precision software ensures that your calibrations are completed efficiently, and will meet or exceed the manufacturers specifications.

items.title: Experienced Factory Trained Technicians
items.description: With over 100 years of combined experience, you can be confident that calibrations and repairs are completed to the most exacting standards.

items.title: Complete Measurement range
items.description: We calibrates the entire measurement range of you testing instruments and indicates this on the calibration certificate. With a calibration of multiple measuring points, the range of application for your instruments.

slides.title: Spazio per tutto
slides.description: La nostra collezione di zaini è stata progettata per soddisfare le esigenze di tutti i tipi di persone, dagli abitanti delle città urbane agli avventurieri all'aperto.

components.content:
Cookies and other similar technologies are an essential part of how our Platform works. The main goal of cookies is to make your browsing experience easier and more efficient and to improve our services and the Platform itself. Likewise, we use cookies to show you targeted advertising when you visit third-party websites and apps. Here, you will find all the information on the cookies we use. Furthermore, you will be able to activate and/or deactivate them according to your preferences, except for any cookies that are strictly necessary for the functioning of the Platform.\
\
Keep in mind that blocking certain cookies may affect your experience on the Platform, as well as its functioning. By clicking “Confirm my preferences,” the cookies selection you have made will be saved. If you have not selected any options, clicking this button will be the same as blocking all cookies. For more information, please consult our terms.\
\
Here, you will find all the information on the cookies we use. Furthermore, you will be able to activate and/or deactivate them according to your preferences, except for any cookies that are strictly necessary for the functioning of the Platform.\
